original_title: Lunar: Rebalance & Recharge with Tara Lee - Lunar Rebalance
overview: This 2-part segment focuses on slowing down the mind and synchronising gentle physical movement with the breath.  The postures will help release any anxiety and clear the mind.  After practising these routines you will feel relaxed and renewed.
title: Lunar: Rebalance & Recharge with Tara Lee - Lunar Rebalance
